trans-unit.source: Represents the abstract base class that manages events and layout for all the elements that a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> can contain.
trans-unit.target: 表示管理事件和布局的所有元素的抽象基类， <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref>可以包含。

trans-unit.source: A ToolStripItem is an element such as a button, combo box, text box, or label that can be contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> control or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> control, which is similar to a Windows shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripItem 是一个元素，如按钮、 组合框、 文本框中或中可包含的标签<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控件或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>控件，类似于 Windows 快捷菜单。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> class manages the painting and keyboard and mouse input, including drag-and-drop input, for these elements, and the ToolStripItem class manages events and layout within the elements themselves.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>类管理绘制、 键盘和鼠标输入，包括拖放的这些元素中，输入和 ToolStripItem 类管理事件和在其自身的元素中的布局。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: ToolStripItem classes either inherit directly from ToolStripItem, or they inherit indirectly from ToolStripItem through <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripItem 类也继承直接从 ToolStripItem，或它们间接从继承 ToolStripItem<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>通过

trans-unit.source: ToolStripItem controls must be contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> and cannot be added directly to a form.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripItem 控件必须包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>和不能直接添加到窗体。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The various container classes are designed to contain an appropriate subset of ToolStripItem controls.
trans-unit.target: 各种容器类旨在包含 ToolStripItem 控件的相应子集。

trans-unit.source: **Note** A given ToolStripItem cannot have more than one parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: **请注意**给定的 ToolStripItem 不能有多个父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: You must copy of the ToolStripItem and add it to other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: 你必须复制的 ToolStripItem 并将其添加到其他<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the elements that derive from the ToolStripItem class and which therefore can be hosted in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>中的元素派生自 ToolStripItem 类，且其因此可以承载

trans-unit.source: |Element|Description| |-------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>|A toolbar button that supports images and text.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>|A text label typically used in a status bar or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> as a comment or title.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator>|A non-selectable space or space with a vertical bar that visually groups elements.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>|A ToolStripItem that hosts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>, other Windows Forms controls, or custom controls.
trans-unit.target: |元素 |说明 | |-------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>|支持图像和文本的工具栏按钮。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>|在状态栏或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>通常使用作为注释或标题的文本标签。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator>|非可选空格或以直观地对元素进行分组的垂直条的空间。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>|ToolStripItem，它承载<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>，其他 Windows 窗体控件或自定义控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> is a text box in which the user can enter text, along with a list from which the user can select text to fill the text box.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>一个文本框，用户可以在其中输入文本，以及用户可以从中选择的文本以填充文本框中的列表。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> enables the user to enter text.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>使用户能够输入文本。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> represents a Windows progress bar control contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>|A ToolStripItem that hosts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>表示 Windows 进度栏控件包含在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>|ToolStripItem，它承载<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> is a selectable option displayed on a menu or context menu.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>是菜单或上下文菜单上显示的可选选项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> is a combination of a regular button and a drop-down button.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>是常规按钮和一个下拉列表按钮的组合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> is a button that supports drop-down functionality.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>|A panel in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> control.|
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>是支持下拉菜单的功能的按钮。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>|中的一个面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>控件。 |</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>

trans-unit.target: 在上显示图像<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.target: 名称<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>分配给该控件。

trans-unit.source: To get or set the AccessibilityObject property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取或设置 AccessibilityObject 属性，必须添加对与.NET Framework 一起安装的 Accessibility 程序集的引用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessible objects, see the "Active Accessibility" section in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: 有关辅助性对象的详细信息，请参阅在 MSDN 库中的"Active Accessibility"部分[http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。

trans-unit.source: For samples, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> assigned to the control; if no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> is currently assigned to the control, a new instance is created when this property is first accessed
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>分配给控件; 如果未<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>当前分配给该控件，首次访问此属性时创建的新实例

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default action description of the control for use by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于控件的默认操作说明，供具有辅助功能客户端应用程序。

trans-unit.source: An object's AccessibleDefaultActionDescription property describes the object's primary method of manipulation from the user's viewpoint.
trans-unit.target: 对象的 AccessibleDefaultActionDescription 属性描述对象的主要方法从用户的角度来看的操作。

trans-unit.source: This property should be a verb or a short verb phrase.
trans-unit.target: 此属性应为一个谓词或谓词短语。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Not all objects have default actions, and some objects might have a default action that is related to its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, such as in the following examples: - A selected check box has a default action of "Uncheck" and a value of "Checked."
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 并非所有对象都有默认操作，而某些对象可能都具有与相关的默认操作其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，例如，下面的示例:-选中的复选框，并且在"请先取消选中"默认操作的值为"已选中。"</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - A cleared check box has a default action of "Check" and a value of "Unchecked."
trans-unit.target: -A 清除的复选框还具有默认操作的"检查"和"未选中。"的值

trans-unit.source: - A button labeled **Print** has a default action of "Press," with no value.
trans-unit.target: 的标记按钮**打印**"Press，"默认操作具有任何值。

trans-unit.source: - A label or a text box control that shows **Printer** has no default action, but would have a value of "Printer."
trans-unit.target: -A 标签或文本框控件显示**打印机**没有默认操作，但"打印机。"的值

trans-unit.source: For more information about properties of accessible objects, see "Content of Descriptive Properties" in the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library, at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 有关辅助性对象的属性的详细信息，请参阅"内容的描述性属性"的"Active Accessibility"部分中的 MSDN 库中，在 http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。

trans-unit.source: For samples, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: The default action description of the control, for use by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 该控件，以供辅助功能客户端应用程序的默认操作说明。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the description that will be reported to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置将报告给具有辅助功能客户端应用程序的说明。

trans-unit.source: An object's AccessibleDescription property provides a textual description about an object's visual appearance.
trans-unit.target: 对象的 AccessibleDescription 属性提供有关对象的可视外观的文本说明。

trans-unit.source: The description is primarily used to provide greater context for low-vision or blind users, but can also be used for context searching or other applications.
trans-unit.target: 描述主要用于提供更大的上下文对于视力较差或盲人用户，但还可用于上下文搜索或其他应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The AccessibleDescription property is needed if the description is not obvious, or if it is not redundant based on the object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleRole%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.State%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: AccessibleDescription 属性是描述不是很明显，如果需要或如果它不是冗余基于对象的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleRole%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.State%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.State%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleRole%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, a button labeled **OK** would not need additional information, but a button that shows a picture of a cactus would.
trans-unit.target: 例如，标记的按钮**确定**将不需要其他信息，但会显示的兰图片的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleName%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleRole%2A> and, perhaps, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Help%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties for the cactus button would describe its purpose, but the AccessibleDescription property would convey information that is less tangible, such as "A button that shows a picture of a cactus."
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleName%2A>和的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleRole%2A>可能是，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Help%2A?displayProperty=fullName>兰按钮的属性将描述其用途，但 AccessibleDescription 属性传达这就是不太明确，例如"A 按钮显示兰的图片。"的信息</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Help%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleRole%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about properties of accessible objects, see "Content of Descriptive Properties" in the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library, at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 有关辅助性对象的属性的详细信息，请参阅"内容的描述性属性"的"Active Accessibility"部分中的 MSDN 库中，在 http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。

trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: The description of the control used by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 辅助功能客户端应用程序使用的控件说明。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the control for use by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置供具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序使用的控件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The AccessibleName property is a label that briefly describes and identifies the object within its container, such as the text in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>, the name of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, or a label displayed next to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: AccessibleName 属性是一个标签，简要描述并标识其容器，例如中的文本中的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>，则名称<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>，或旁边显示标签<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>

trans-unit.source: For more information about properties of accessible objects, see "Content of Descriptive Properties" in the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library, at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 有关辅助性对象的属性的详细信息，请参阅"内容的描述性属性"的"Active Accessibility"部分中的 MSDN 库中，在 http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。

trans-unit.source: For samples, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: The name of the control, for use by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 控件的名称，以供辅助功能客户端应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the accessible role of the control, which specifies the type of user interface element of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定的用户界面元素的控件类型的控件的可访问角色。

trans-unit.source: The AccessibleRole property describes what kind of user interface element an object is.
trans-unit.target: AccessibleRole 属性描述对象是哪种类型的用户界面元素。

trans-unit.source: If the control's role cannot be determined, the AccessibleRole property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法确定控件的角色，AccessibleRole 属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about properties of accessible objects, see "Content of Descriptive Properties" in the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library, at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 有关辅助性对象的属性的详细信息，请参阅"内容的描述性属性"的"Active Accessibility"部分中的 MSDN 库中，在 http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。

trans-unit.source: For samples, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 分配的值不是之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the item aligns towards the beginning or end of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否项对齐的开头或末尾<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: In a stack overflow layout, use the Alignment property along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to control the end to which items are aligned in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, or to determine the end to which they are already aligned.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>单击。

trans-unit.source: The Click event passes an <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler, so it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 单击事件传递<xref:System.EventArgs>给其事件处理程序中，因此它仅指示发生了单击操作。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseUp> events which pass a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs> to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更具体的鼠标信息 （按钮、 单击、 鼠标轮旋转或位置的数），使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseDown>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseUp>传递事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs>到事件处理程序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定一次双击。

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以设置单击鼠标按钮它认为是双击而不是两次单击之间的时间。

trans-unit.source: The Click event is raised every time a control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 每次双击控件时，将引发单击事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have two event handlers for the Click and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick> events of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the Click and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick> events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both methods are called.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有两个事件处理程序为单击和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick>的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，单击和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick>双击窗体，这两种方法调用时将引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: If an item is double-clicked that does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick> event, the Click event might be raised twice.
trans-unit.target: 如果项是双击，不支持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick>事件，可能引发事件两次单击。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于流布局。

trans-unit.source: Use the Dock property to define how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.

trans-unit.source: For example, setting Dock to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 例如，设置为停靠<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>将其自身对齐其父控件的左边缘和根据父控件一起调整大小调整大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked in their Z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's Z-axis (depth).

trans-unit.source: A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container.
trans-unit.target: 控件可以停靠到其父容器的一个边或可以停靠到所有边缘和填充的父容器。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user drags an item and the user releases the mouse button, indicating that the item should be dropped into this item.
trans-unit.target: 当用户拖动某项，并且用户释放鼠标按钮，该值指示此项应该被放入该项时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs>位于屏幕坐标，未工作区坐标。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user drags an item into the client area of this item.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将项拖动到此项目的工作区时发生。

trans-unit.source: The DragEnter event is raised when the user first drags the mouse cursor over the item during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在拖放操作过程中首次将鼠标光标拖到项时，将引发 DragEnter 事件。

trans-unit.source: The following remarks describe how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: 下面的备注描述如何以及何时引发与拖放操作相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the item under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A>方法确定当前光标位置下的项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the item is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: 然后检查以查看项是否为有效的放置目标。

trans-unit.source: If the item is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果项是有效的放置目标，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>产生指定的拖放效果引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关拖放效果的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked in the following manner: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 按以下方式跟踪的更改的鼠标光标位置、 键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态:-如果用户移出一个窗口，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another item, the DragEnter for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果鼠标进入另一个项，将引发该控件 DragEnter。

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个项，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如果键盘或鼠标按钮中更改状态，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag>事件引发，并确定是否继续拖动、 放置数据或取消该操作基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>事件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>的值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>引发事件以继续操作和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>产生新效果引发事件，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position, as follows: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标时，用户提供的最新反馈有关鼠标位置，如下所示:-如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>、 向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以执行适当的操作的源数据; 例如，如果会剪切数据是移动操作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs>位于屏幕坐标，未工作区坐标。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>

trans-unit.target: 当用户拖动某项并且鼠标指针不再此项目的工作区上方时发生。

trans-unit.source: The DragLeave event is raised when the user drags the cursor out of the control or the user cancels the current drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将拖出控件的光标或用户取消当前的拖放操作时，将引发 DragLeave 事件。

trans-unit.source: The DragOver event is raised when the mouse cursor moves within the bounds of the control during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标光标拖放操作期间的控件的边界内移动时，将引发拖动事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the parent control of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值控制是否父级的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>已启用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the parent control of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled*>属性值已更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled%2A>属性更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not raise the EnabledChanged event.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> Changing<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>不会引发 EnabledChanged 事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raise this event with specific property settings.
trans-unit.target: 引发此事件具有特定属性设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由该项显示的文本的字体。

trans-unit.source: Use the Font property to get or set the font that will be used by default for painting and text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 使用的字体属性来获取或设置将用于默认情况下绘制和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>中的文本的字体

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the text displayed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>要应用于由显示的文本<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置项的前景色。

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the item.
trans-unit.target: 前台<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>的项。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColor*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColor*>属性值更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColor%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or through interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColor%2A>通过以编程方式修改或通过交互更改属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not raise the ForeColorChanged event.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> Changing<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>不会引发 ForeColorChanged 事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> that is the container of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 检索<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> ，它是当前的容器<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: GetCurrentParent is a read-only accessor to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Parent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: GetCurrentParent 是对只读访问器<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Parent%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: A parent differs from an owner in that a parent denotes the returned current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in which the item is displayed, which might be in the overflow area.
trans-unit.target: 父与不同所有者的父表示返回的当前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>在其中将显示该项，这可能会溢出区域中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> that is the container of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> ，它是当前的容器<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fit.
trans-unit.target: 检索可以容纳控件的矩形区域的大小。

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: 控件自定义大小的区域。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> ordered pair, representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>有序对，表示的宽度和高度的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 在拖动操作期间发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>启动拖放操作时引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event allows the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>事件允许拖动事件，以便为用户可视反馈提供拖放操作期间修改鼠标指针的外观的源。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: The following remarks describe how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: 下面的备注描述如何以及何时引发与拖放操作相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the item under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A>方法确定当前光标位置下的项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the item is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: 然后检查以查看项是否为有效的放置目标。

trans-unit.source: If the item is a valid drop target, the GiveFeedback event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果该项是有效的放置目标，GiveFeedback 事件将引发与指定的拖放效果。

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关拖放效果的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked in the following manner: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 按以下方式跟踪的更改的鼠标光标位置、 键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态:-如果用户移出一个窗口，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果鼠标进入另一个项，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter>引发该控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个项，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如果键盘或鼠标按钮中更改状态，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag>事件引发，并确定是否继续拖动、 放置数据或取消该操作基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>事件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>的值</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the GiveFeedback event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>引发事件以继续操作并 GiveFeedback 事件引发产生新效果，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> and GiveFeedback events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position, as follows: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>和 GiveFeedback 事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标时，用户提供的最新反馈有关鼠标位置，如下所示:-如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>、 向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以执行适当的操作的源数据; 例如，如果会剪切数据是移动操作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的高度，以像素为单位， <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the height, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>表示的高度，以像素为单位。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示的图像<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Image, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: 该映像， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>属性与图像处理的各个方面。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控件通过设置这些属性直接或通过设置运行-– 仅限时间<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: 图像缩放由属性中的交互<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>、，如下所示:-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>是确定的最终图像的图像的组合按比例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>设置和容器的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>设置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`true`（默认值） 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>，会发生任何图像缩放，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>大小是最大项或规定的最小大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`false`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>，既不映像也不<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>会进行缩放。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>要显示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, ImageAlign, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: 图像缩放由属性中的交互<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>、，如下所示:-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>是确定的最终图像的图像的组合按比例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>设置和容器的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>设置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a character is an input character that the item recognizes.
trans-unit.target: 确定字符是否为该项可识别的输入的字符。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the given input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 在预处理来确定是否应经过预处理，或直接发送到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>给定输入的字符的窗口消息过程中调用此方法

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A> method returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>方法返回`true`，指定的字符被直接发送到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if the method returns `false`, the character is preprocessed and only sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果该方法返回`false`，字符被预处理并仅发送到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>如果它不使用预处理阶段时。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.
trans-unit.target: 字符的预处理包括检查的字符是否另一个控件的助记键。

trans-unit.source: The character to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的字符。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character should be sent directly to the item and not preprocessed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果字符应直接发送到项且不必经过预处理，;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的键是常规输入的键还是需要预处理的特殊键。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A> method during window-message preprocessing to determine whether the specified key is a regular input key that should be sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> or a special key (such as PAGE UP, PAGE DOWN, ENTER, ESC, TAB, or arrow keys) that should be preprocessed.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>方法在窗口消息预处理以确定是否指定的键是常规输入的键，应直接发送期间<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>还是应预处理的特殊键 （如 PAGE UP、 PAGE DOWN、 ENTER、 ESC、 选项卡上或箭头键）。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the latter case, the key is sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> only if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: 在后一种情况，密钥将发送到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>仅当它不使用预处理阶段时。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的键是常规输入的键;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此项的所有者。

trans-unit.target: 所有者返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>其项集合包含当前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: This is the best way to reference <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> or other properties in the top-level <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> without writing special code to handle overflow.
trans-unit.target: 这是引用的最佳方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>或其他属性位于顶级<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>而无需编写特殊的代码来处理溢出。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Owner remains the same even if the item falls into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: 所有者保持不变，即使项落入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>

trans-unit.source: The Owner can be `null` for certain elements that are in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A> collection but not in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 所有者可以是`null`的某些元素，位于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A>集合但未显示在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GetCurrentParent%2A> is a read-only accessor to the Parent property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GetCurrentParent%2A>是对父属性只读访问器。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GetCurrentParent%2A>

trans-unit.source: A parent differs from an owner in that a parent denotes the returned current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in which the item is displayed, which might be in the overflow area.
trans-unit.target: 父与不同所有者的父表示返回的当前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>在其中将显示该项，这可能会溢出区域中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> raises paint events and so on, while the owner <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> contains shared data such as image lists.
trans-unit.target: 父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>引发绘制事件等，而所有者<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>包含共享的数据，例如图像列表。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Parent property is set by the layout manager on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 通常，父属性设置上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>的布局管理器

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>的父容器<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Generates a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Click" name="Click" href=""></xref> event for a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ToolStripItem" name="ToolStripItem" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 生成<xref uid="langword_csharp_Click" name="Click" href=""></xref>事件<xref uid="langword_csharp_ToolStripItem" name="ToolStripItem" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current layout of the item.
trans-unit.target: 获取项的当前布局。

trans-unit.source: Inspect the Placement property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, the overflow <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, or if it is not currently showing at all.
trans-unit.target: 检查中的放置属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>事件，以确定某项放在主<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，溢出<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，或如果当前根本未显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The typical reasons why an item is not displayed are that the item did not fit on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property was set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: 为什么不显示项的通常原因是该项未无法容纳在 main<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemPlacement"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemPlacement"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the state of the item is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否按下了项的状态。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the state of the item is pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果按项的状态;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: 处理命令键。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys.
trans-unit.target: 在消息预处理以处理命令键过程中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys.
trans-unit.target: 命令键是始终优先于常规输入键的键。

trans-unit.source: Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: 命令键的示例包括快捷键和菜单快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key.
trans-unit.target: 该方法必须返回`true`以指示它已处理命令键，或`false`以指示该密钥不是命令键。

trans-unit.source: The base-class implementation of ProcessCmdKey method returns `false` in all cases.
trans-unit.target: ProcessCmdKey 方法的基类实现返回`false`在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>，按引用传递，表示要处理的窗口消息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>这些值表示要处理的键。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog key.
trans-unit.target: 处理对话框键。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle the ENTER and SPACEBAR keys in order to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 消息处理 enter 键，并按空格键密钥，以便引发预处理过程中调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> method indicates that the item is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: 仅当调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>方法指示该项未在处理该键。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref>这些值表示要处理的键。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed by the item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果键已由项; 处理否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 处理助记键字符。

trans-unit.source: This method is called to give an item the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法为项提供机会处理助记键字符。

trans-unit.source: The method should determine whether the item is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 方法应确定项目是否处于处理助记键的状态，以及是否给定的字符是否表示助记键。

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过因此，此方法应执行与助记键并返回关联的操作`true`。

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，该方法应返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: This base-class implementation relies on the host <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> control to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 此基类实现依赖于主机<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控件才能调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>方法来确定给定的字符是否匹配项的文本中的助记符。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event and returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，该方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>事件，并返回`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的字符。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an accessibility client application invokes help for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 辅助功能客户端应用程序调用的帮助时发生<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class to allow users to invoke help on your accessible object by pressing the F1 key.
trans-unit.target: 应使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>类以允许用户通过按 F1 键来调用你可访问的对象的帮助。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> provides you with complete information in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>中的完整信息为您提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>

trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 拖放操作期间发生，并且允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: The QueryContinueDrag event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: QueryContinueDrag 事件在拖放操作期间键盘或鼠标按钮状态更改时引发。

trans-unit.source: The QueryContinueDrag event allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: QueryContinueDrag 事件允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: The following remarks describe how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: 下面的备注描述如何以及何时引发与拖放操作相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the item under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A>方法确定当前光标位置下的项。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the item is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: 然后检查以查看项是否为有效的放置目标。

trans-unit.source: If the item is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果项是有效的放置目标，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>产生指定的拖放效果引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关拖放效果的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked in the following manner: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 按以下方式跟踪的更改的鼠标光标位置、 键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态:-如果用户移出一个窗口，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果鼠标进入另一个项，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter>引发该控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个项，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the QueryContinueDrag event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态的更改，QueryContinueDrag 事件引发，并确定是否继续拖动、 放置数据，或取消该操作基于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>事件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>的值

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Continue`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Continue`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>引发事件以继续操作和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>产生新效果引发事件，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position, as follows: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标时，用户提供的最新反馈有关鼠标位置，如下所示:-如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Drop`、 向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以执行适当的操作的源数据; 例如，如果会剪切数据是移动操作。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -如果的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Cancel`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: Gets the orientation of text used on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取上所用文本的方向<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> text and image relative to each other.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的位置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>文本和图像相对于彼此。

trans-unit.source: Use the TextImageRelation property to define or determine the relative placement of the image with respect to the text on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 TextImageRelation 属性来定义或确定与一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>上的文本图像的相对位置

trans-unit.source: Items that lack an image, text, or both are treated as special cases so that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> does not display a blank spot for the missing element or elements.
trans-unit.target: 中缺少映像、 文本或这两项，将被视为特殊情况下，以便<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>不会显示为缺少的一个或多个元素的空白处。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that appears as a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> for a control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示为文本<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>的控件。

trans-unit.source: ToolTipText works only if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: ToolTipText 才可以工作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A>设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoToolTip%2A> is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property for the item is used as the ToolTipText.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoToolTip%2A>设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>项的属性用作 ToolTipText。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: 表示工具提示文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.String>包含名称的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>，如果任何。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This method should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不应被替代。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含名称的<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>(如果有） 或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>是未命名。</xref:System.String>
